channel.title: LegendScape Opens Actual Server!
channel.description:
LegendScape has now opened an actual server. This means that our game server or RSP can now opporate 24/7! That means a 100% uptime. This is all because we have switched our game server over to a server all its' own.
I will not advertise it here but I would like to point out a few things:
[ul][li]We cannot guarentee it to be lag free for everyone.[/li] [li][b]THE SERVER RESTARTS EVERY 45 MINUTES TO PREVENT CRASHING[/b][/li][/ul]
If you experience issues or bugs please contact:
Server.Support@legendscape.net jarrett.wilson@legendscape.net
Check the server status page for "LegendScape Official"

item.title: LegendScape Opens Actual Server!
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

[quote=“Paulthegoat2, post:4, topic:143647”]Oh, well congratulations on such an achievement. Good luck to you and your server.[/quote]Thanks btw if it is off then it should be back in a few minutes it restarts every 45 minutes to keep things running smooth

Read full topic

item.title: LegendScape Opens Actual Server!
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

LegendScape has now opened an actual server. This means that our game server or RSP can now opporate 24/7! That means a 100% uptime. This is all because we have switched our game server over to a server all its’ own.

I will not advertise it here but I would like to point out a few things:

[ul][li]We cannot guarentee it to be lag free for everyone.[/li]
[li]THE SERVER RESTARTS EVERY 45 MINUTES TO PREVENT CRASHING[/li][/ul]

If you experience issues or bugs please contact:

Server.Support@legendscape.net
jarrett.wilson@legendscape.net

Check the server status page for “LegendScape Official”

Read full topic
